document_data.name: Swords of Suldolphor
document_data.mainbody: The '''Swords of Suldolphor''' was the militia of [[Suldolphor]] the Golden City in far eastern [[Calimshan]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Organization: The militia was composed of 16,000 soldiers armed with [[spear]]s, [[shield]]s, [[sword]]s, and [[dagger]]s. The Swords of Suldolphor were paid by, and ultimately answered to, the elite bodyguard of [[olanger]] [[Daeranatha Dorluu]] called the [[Flame Guard]].
